pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, December 17, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

Media appearances

8:00 a.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on TVA’s Salut Bonjour.
8:45 a.m. An interview with the Prime Minister and Terry DiMonte will air on CHOM 97.7 FM’s Mornings Rock.
